data.country: International country code of the country you want to receive alerts for
data.language: International country code for the translation of the alerts you want to receive

error.wrong_country_or_province: The country or province you have provided is incorrect. Please check the integration documentation for more instructions

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_wrong_count.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration import is invalid
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_wrong_count.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was an error importing your YAML configuration indicating the country or province name in your configuration is incorrect.

Please make sure {integration_title} is turned on, and restart Home Assistant to try importing again. Otherwise, please remove the YAML from your configuration and add the integration manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration could not be imported
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error importing your YAML configuration.

Please make sure {integration_title} is turned on, and restart Home Assistant to try importing again. Otherwise, please remove the YAML from your configuration and add the integration manually.
